org.eclipse.jface.resource.DeviceResourceDescriptor

Packages that use DeviceResourceDescriptor
Package
Description
org.eclipse.compare.internal
 
org.eclipse.jface.resource
Provides support for managing resources such as SWT fonts and images.
org.eclipse.jface.viewers
Provides a framework for viewers, which are model-based content adapters for SWT widgets.

    DecorationOverlayIcon
    A DecorationOverlayIcon is an image descriptor that can be used to overlay decoration images on to the 4 corner quadrants of a base image.
